While I do recommend this game, please know that the devs are not good. They balance and update at a small fraction of what they should be doing for the size of their studio and the popularity of their game. When they do balance they take little to no feedback from the community and just sorta do whatever they heck they feel like. It makes for a frustrating and often unfun experience made worse by how much potential this game has. The reason I still recommend it is because, at the moment, there are no better games that are can compete as Dead by Daylight is pretty much alone in it's genre of asymmetrical horror.

the game in itself is very fun. but they don't listen to what their community wants and they do as they please. which i understand its a game they made but they have a very large community that's very unhappy with their choices. and at the moment there are a lot of glitch/ lag issues. before their most recent chapter release i never had lag issues. i have internet specifically for gaming as well. but from their newest release i have been rubber banding like crazy. again. very fun game but there are a lot of issues that need fixing but it doesn't seem to be their top priority. i'm selecting no. but honestly its a fun game. if you wanna try it ofc you should. but remember there are lag issues :) hope this is helpful <3

El juego esta muy bien pero es una reverenda pija que pierdas la conexion por "x" problema y no te den la oportunidad de reingresar a la partida y para colmo te comes un bloqueo por "abandono". Solucionen eso que no cuesta nada y dejen de sacar skins pelotudos.

I love how the killers play, they're very interesting and the grind of the game always makes you come back for more! The survivor game play is also interesting as well so I would definitely recommend this game to others!

Honestly Dead by Daylight is amazing, it has it's problems like every other game does but it's honestly a fun game and like most games it's better if you play with other people. A lot of people complain about the game because of the way the ranking system works (a bit of the meme in the community) but other than that I honestly see no other issues with the game and highly recommend it.

DLC -   This game is a dlc simulator dont ever buy it at full price. ive spent alot on this game on ps4 and bought every dlc and bought $200 worth of auric cells. its not worth it in my opinion, so many bad dlcs that i was dissapointed with.

Devs -   Devs dont listen to fans or streamers they got to help promote dbd.
this games success thrives on the fact that no other game in this genre has replicated the feeling of dbd so they use this to be lazy and pump out a unfinnished broken dlc every few months at full price. i see potential in the devs and i believe they can do better, but they arent challenged enough so they have been producing bad content.

fun? -    The games not bad, youll love to hate it, its fun with friends but so is every game. im at red ranks and it can get pretty tense. but man playing too much gets you burnt out, frustrated, and bored making you regret paying $10 per skin in the game, the game is not worth the full price so get it on sale.

-Ingredientes para hacer Panqueques s√∫per f√°ciles de hacer:

¬æ taza de leche (180 mililitros)

Paso 1: Hacer panqueques es s√∫per f√°cil. Primero, re√∫ne todos los ingredientes. Si no tienes harina leudante o preparada, que es harina de trigo que ya incluye levadura (tambi√©n se llama harina de reposter√≠a), puedes usar harina de trigo normal y a√±adir una cucharadita de levadura qu√≠mica en polvo (polvo de hornear).

Paso 2: Coloca la harina en un bol y a√±ade el huevo y la leche. Mezcla bien hasta que se integren estos ingredientes y no queden casi grumos.

Paso 3: Para terminar de hacer la masa de los panqueques caseros, agrega un chorrito de aceite y mezcla bien. Ver√°s que el aceite hace que se terminen de disolver los grumos de harina y quede una masa lisa y homog√©nea.

Paso 4: Para hacer los panqueques, calienta una sart√©n a fuego medio-bajo con un poquito de aceite o mantequilla. Cuando la sart√©n est√© caliente, a√±ade una cucharada de mezcla y d√©jala al fuego hasta que empiecen a salir burbujas en la superficie, entonces dale la vuelta y cocina por el otro lado.

Paso 5: Para servir la receta de panqueques ,a√±ade un poquito de mantequilla y miel y a disfrutar. Si quieres comerlos con algo salado, puedes servirlos con bacon y huevos fritos o un revuelto con jam√≥n.
